msg.msgText: imaserver user edit "Item1=value" ... SYNTAX: imaserver user edit help imaserver user edit "Item1=value" ... EXAMPLE: imaserver user edit "UserID=webUser1" "Type=WebUI" "AddGroupMembership=SystemAdministrators" imaserver user edit "UserID=msgUser1" "Type=Messaging" "Password=NewPassword" Configuration items are: UserID The user ID. Type The user type. Only [WebUI] or [Messaging] are allowed. Password The new password for the user. Description The new description for the user. AddGroupMembership Add UserID as a member of this group. RemoveGroupMembership Remove UserID from this group. NOTES: 1. "UserID", "Type" are required items. 2. At least one of the following items must be specified: "Password", "Description", "AddGroupMembership" or "RemoveGroupMembership". 3. Cannot use both "AddGroupMembership" and "RemoveGroupMembership" in one command line operation. For WebUI user, only [SystemAdministrators], [MessagingAdministrators] or [Users] are allowed. 4. All "Key=value" pair must be enclosed within double quotation marks.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
